 selects the images (as it is now), and the second one can take the images
 and return the sliding windows (or a subset of them).

body:
A dataset in the form of an iterable is in the works. I will finish it
around early December.

On Wed, Nov 21, 2018 at 00:03 Francisco Massa <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> You can do something like that with a double dataloader: the first one
> selects the images (as it is now), and the second one can take the images
> and return the sliding windows (or a subset of them).
>
> How does that sound?
>
